text: Ogoh saved sumo! Sumo dar ʙorai on ci ki ʙa on ilm va ogohi dosted dar amri Muso va Iso va da'vo karded, ki sumo ʙar dini onon hasted va hol on ki Tavrotu Incil ʙa sumo nozil suda ʙud, ʙa cidol pardoxted, Pas caro dar mavridi on ci ki dar on ilm nadored va dar kitoʙaton zikr nasuda ʙud, ki Iʙrohim jahudi jo nasroni ʙud cidol mekuned? Hol on ki Alloh medonad va sumo namedoned
